Can absences be reported before the chil.answer: If a child is absent for more than one session of child care on the same day, such as both before and after school care, it is counted as one absence day. Child care providers must keep records of each absence for the child.

How many kids can you have in family day.answer: How many children can a family day care educator look after. You must not educate and care for more than seven children at your residence or approved venue at any one time. This includes: no more than four children preschool age or under.

Will Centrelink back pay child care subs.answer: To get Child Care Subsidy you need to submit a claim. You must be using an approved child care provider. If eligible, we'll pay the subsidy directly to your provider. If eligible, we may be able to backdate your subsidy for up to 28 days.
